cards.name: Frostbite
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Whenever you play a card, increase the cost of a random card in your hand by 1 this turn.

cards.name: Gnats
cards.description:
Unplayable.
You cannot play 0-cost cards this turn.

cards.name: Nettles
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, apply 1 Thorns to a random enemy.

cards.name: Spoilage
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At end of turn, put this card on top of your draw pile if you played 3 or more cards this turn.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 (8) Block.

cards.name: Haymaker
cards.description:
Deal 9 (13) damage.
Heal 4 (6) HP.
Apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Reap and Sow
cards.description:
Deal 4 (6) damage to ALL enemies.
Plant 1 (2) Potatoes, then add a Cultivate to your discard pile if you have any Mature Crops.

cards.name: Reap and Squash
cards.description:
Deal 4 (6) damage to ALL enemies. Gain 4 (6) Block.
Plant 1 (2) Squash, then add a Cultivate to your discard pile if you have any Mature Crops.

cards.name: Reek and Sow
cards.description:
Deal 4 (6) damage and apply 4 (6) Burning to ALL enemies.
Plant 2 (3) Onions, then add a Cultivate to your discard pile if you have any Mature Crops.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 (9) damage.

cards.name: Aerate
cards.description:
Gain 9 (13) Block.
Plant 2 of your newest Crop.

cards.name: Bumper Crop
cards.description:
Gain 7 (10) Block.
Harvest 1 of your newest Crop.

cards.name: Close Scrape
cards.description:
Deal 9 (12) damage.
Plant 1 of your oldest Crop.

cards.name: Culling Strike
cards.description:
Deal 7 (9) damage.
If you've Harvested this turn, deal 7 (9) damage again.

cards.name: Double Barrel
cards.description:
Deal 6 (9) damage.
If the enemy is Weak, gain [E] and deal 6 (9) damage again.

cards.name: Ferment
cards.description:
Shuffle 2 cards from your hand into your draw pile (, then draw a card).
Gain [E] [E].

cards.name: Fertilaser
cards.description:
Deal 11 (14) damage.
Plant 1 more of each Crop.

cards.name: Onion Bloom
cards.description:
Innate.
Plant 1 Onion.
~~-   -~~ Draw a card.
Discard a card.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Onions
cards.description: Plant 3 Onions.

cards.name: Pest Management
cards.description:
Deal 8 (10) damage.
Next turn, gain 8 (10) Block.

cards.name: Potatoes
cards.description: Plant 3 Potatoes.

cards.name: Pruning
cards.description: Harvest all of your oldest Crop, then Plant 1 (2) stack (stacks).

cards.name: Rototilling
cards.description:
Draw 2 (3) cards.
Exhaust a card from your hand.

cards.name: Salad Shooter
cards.description:
Deal 6 (7) damage to a random enemy.
Repeat for each time you've Harvested this turn.

cards.name: Seed Coat
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
The first time this card is played this combat, decrease its Block by 8 (4) and it gains Exhaust.

cards.name: Slash And Burn
cards.description:
Deal 7 (10) damage.
Apply 7 (10) Burning.

cards.name: Spice Up
cards.description:
Apply 10 (12) Burning.
Draw 1 (2) card (cards).

cards.name: Squash
cards.description: Plant 3 Squash.

cards.name: Swelter
cards.description:
Apply 1 (2) Weak and 4 (6) Burning.
Gain 4 (6) Block.

cards.name: Toughen Up
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
If you have any Squash, Plant 1 (2) Squash.

cards.name: Artichokes
cards.description: Plant 2 Artichokes.

cards.name: Controlled Burn
cards.description:
Apply 14 (20) Burning.
Exhaust if the enemy didn't already have Burning.

cards.name: Corn
cards.description: Plant 1 (2) Corn.

cards.name: Crop Rotation
cards.description:
Harvest all of a random Crop.
Gain a random In-Season Crop Power card.

cards.name: Dig In
cards.description:
Gain 10 (14) Block.
Add a Depletion to your discard pile.

cards.name: Germinate
cards.description: If your newest Crop is Mature, gain 14 (18) Block. Otherwise, Plant 2 of that Crop.

cards.name: Go to Market
cards.description: Draw a card for each different type of Crop you have.

cards.name: Innovate
cards.description: Add a random card with Harvest to your hand. It costs 0 this turn (combat).

cards.name: Keen Edge
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
Deal 9 damage.
Increase this card's damage by 9 and its cost by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Mulch
cards.description:
Exhaust a card, then gain an effect based on its type:
NL Attack: Gain 6 Block.
Skill: Apply 4 Burning to ALL.
All Others: Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Polyculture
cards.description:
Shuffle 2 (3) random Crop Power cards into your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Rake
cards.description:
Deal 7 (8) damage.
Apply 1 (2) Weak.

cards.name: Root Down
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Deal 6 damage.
Plant 1 Turnips.

cards.name: Soil Sample
cards.description:
Shuffle up to 3 cards from your discard pile into your draw pile, then draw (Draw) a card. It costs 0 this turn.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Stock the Cellar
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 6 (8) Block.
Each time this card is shuffled into your draw pile, increase its Block by 2 (3) for this combat.

cards.name: Sunchoke
cards.description:
Deal 7 (11) damage to ALL enemies.
Each Weak enemy that takes damage also gains 7 (11) Burning.

cards.name: Sunflowers
cards.description: Plant 1 (2) Sunflower (Sunflowers).

cards.name: Sunseed
cards.description:
(Innate. ) When drawn, copy this card if your discard is empty.
Deal 3 damage and gain [E].
Exhaust.

cards.name: Thresh
cards.description:
Deal 22 (28) damage.
Costs [E] less for each time you Harvest this turn.

cards.name: Turnips
cards.description: Plant 2 (3) Turnips.

cards.name: Vine Ripen
cards.description:
Plant 2 Squash.
If Squash is Mature, Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Asparagus
cards.description: Plant 1 (2) Asparagus.

cards.name: Barnstorm
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage to a random enemy for each Crop stack you have.
Stun each enemy damaged 6 or more times this way.

cards.name: Biorefinement
cards.description: The first time each turn that you play a card with Harvest, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Birdfeeder
cards.description: The next 3 (5) times you play a Power card this combat, heal 4 HP.

cards.name: Buzz Bomb
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage to a random enemy 2 (3) times.
Plant 2 Sunflowers for each enemy killed this way.

cards.name: Chilis
cards.description: Plant 3 Chilis.

cards.name: Crack of Dawn
cards.description: In 2 turns, deal 16 damage to ALL enemies, Plant 3 Corn, and gain [E] [E] [E] .

cards.name: Crop Diversity
cards.description:
Add 1 of 2 (3) random Crop Power cards to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Desperate Plunge
cards.description:
Costs [E] less for each Power card played this turn.
Gain 30 (40) Block.
Next turn, lose [E].

cards.name: Double Digging
cards.description: This turn, the next card (2)  (cards ) you play that costs (cost) 1 or less is (are) played twice.

cards.name: Erosion Control
cards.description:
Harvest all crops.
Gain 1 (2) Intangible.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fan the Flames
cards.description:
Apply 10 Burning ( to ALL enemies), then double the (each) enemy's Burning.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fecundity
cards.description: Gain 1 Abundance.

cards.name: Flash Pasteurize
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage to ALL characters.
Remove all of your Debuffs.
 (Gain 7 Block.)
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hit the Sack
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage X (+1) times.
Plant X (+1) Potatoes.

cards.name: Land Grant
cards.description: Gain 1 (2) Plot (Plots).

cards.name: Mushrooms
cards.description: Plant 2 Mushrooms.

cards.name: Photosynthesis
cards.description: At the end of your turn, spend all your unused Energy and Plant that many random In-Season Crops.

cards.name: Research Grant
cards.description:
Gain 16 (20) Block.
Add 2 (3) Soil Samples to your discard pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Resistant Strain
cards.description: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, gain 4 (5) Block.

cards.name: Salt the Earth
cards.description:
Deal 24 (32) damage to ALL enemies.
Add 2 Depletions to your hand.

cards.name: Spinach
cards.description: Plant 2 Spinach.

cards.name: Strawberries
cards.description: Plant 2 (3) Strawberries.

cards.name: Surplus
cards.description:
Add 2 (3) random Common Crop Power cards to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Take Heart
cards.description:
Gain 16 Block.
Heal 5 HP.
Plant 2 Artichokes.
Do this again if your HP is at 50% or less.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Volatile Fumes
cards.description: Whenever you attack an enemy with Weak, apply 4 (6) Burning.

relics.name: Night Soil
relics.description: Whenever you shuffle your deck, for each of your Crops that isn't Mature, Plant 1 more.

relics.name: Spud of the Innocent
relics.description: At the start of your turn, if you have no crops, Plant 2 Potatoes.

relics.name: Trusty Sickle
relics.description: Whenever you Plant a Crop, if you then have more stacks than its Maturity level, Harvest all excess stacks.

relics.name: Weed Puller
relics.description: At the start of each combat, choose up to 2 cards from your hand to exhaust, then draw that many.

relics.name: Cash Crop
relics.description: Whenever you Harvest a Crop for the fist time each combat, gain 5 Gold.

relics.name: Gardening Glove
relics.description: At the end of your turn, if you have exactly one Power card in hand, retain it.
relics.flavorText: Sometimes you need to get into the dirt.

relics.name: Gas Can
relics.description: Whenever you apply Burning, apply half that amount to each other enemy.
relics.flavorText: What can expand to fill any container?

relics.name: Honeycomb
relics.description: Whenever you Plant a Crop, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.

relics.name: Hot Potato
relics.description: Harvesting Potatoes now yields Flaming Spuds, which also apply Burning damage.

relics.name: Jug of Moonshine
relics.description:
On turn 3, gain 5 temporary Strength, then gain [E] and draw an extra card.
Randomize the cost of cards drawn that turn.
relics.flavorText: Based on a carefully-guarded family recipe, the distillation process has claimed its share of casualties.

relics.name: Pickling Jar
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. Every 3 times you shuffle your draw pile, add a copy of that card to your hand. It costs 0 that turn.
relics.flavorText: Sour, salty, and full of dark magic.

relics.name: Planter Box
relics.flavorText: Imported soil tends to produce a less twisted harvest.

relics.name: Spud of the Martyr
relics.description: Whenever you lose HP in combat, gain 1 temporary Strength the following turn.

relics.name: Horn Of Plenty
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a random in-season Crop Power card to your hand. Then gain 1 Abundance which lasts until end of turn.

relics.name: Gourd Charm
relics.description: At the start of your turn, if you have no crops, Plant 2 Squash.
relics.flavorText: Crafted specially for adventurers who prefer Hard Mode.

relics.name: Onion Belt
relics.description: At the start of your turn, if you have no crops, Plant 2 Onions.
relics.flavorText: Once wielded by the Elders, now largely out of style.

potions.name: Bloom Potion
potions.description:
Gain 2 Abundance.
At the end of your turn, lose 2 Abundance.

potions.name: Swig of Moonshine
potions.description: Discard your hand and draw 5 cards. Gain 5 Strength and become Intoxicated until the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Abundance
keywords.description: Increases the number of Crop stacks Planted by cards.

keywords.name: Artichokes
keywords.description: Crop. Grants Thorns when harvested.

keywords.name: Asparagus
keywords.description: Crop. Grants Dexterity when harvested.

keywords.name: Burning
keywords.description: Burning creatures take damage at the end of their turn, then lose Burning.

keywords.name: Chilis
keywords.description: Crop. Deals damage and applies Burning to all enemies when harvested.

keywords.name: Coffee
keywords.description: Crop. Gain energy when harvested.

keywords.name: Corn
keywords.description: Crop. Draw cards when harvested.

keywords.name: Crop
keywords.description: Crops provide beneficial effects when harvested.

keywords.name: Depletion
keywords.description: Depletions are playable status cards that reduce your Energy and Draw next turn.

keywords.name: Gnawberry
keywords.description: Gnawberries are attack cards that deal moderate damage and heal HP.

keywords.name: Harvest
keywords.description: Harvest different Crops for various effects.

keywords.name: Husk
keywords.description: Husks 0-cost skill cards that exhaust to grant a small amount of Block.

keywords.name: Maturity
keywords.description: A Crop is mature if you have stacks equal to its maturity level. One stack of each mature crop is Harvested at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Mushrooms
keywords.description: Crop. Gain random colorless cards when harvested.

keywords.name: Numb
keywords.description: Temporarily increases the cost of a random card in hand when a card is played.

keywords.name: Onions
keywords.description: Crop. Applies Weak to a random enemy when harvested.

keywords.name: Plant
keywords.description: Gain that many Crop stacks.

keywords.name: Plot
keywords.description: Slot for planting Crops. Your Plots determine how many different Crops you can have at one time.

keywords.name: Potatoes
keywords.description: Crop. Yields 0-cost Spud attack cards when harvested.

keywords.name: Spinach
keywords.description: Crop. Grants Strength when harvested.

keywords.name: Spud
keywords.description: Spuds are 0-cost attack cards that exhaust to deal modest damage.

keywords.name: Squash
keywords.description: Crop. Grants Block When harvested.

keywords.name: Strawberries
keywords.description: Crop. Yields Gnawberry attack cards when harvested that also heal a small amount of HP.

keywords.name: Sunflowers
keywords.description: Crop. Gain energy when harvested.

keywords.name: Turnips
keywords.description: Crop. Yields an attack card when harvested which deals scaling damage to all enemies and adds a Turnips card to your discard pile.

mods.name: The Hayseed
mods.credits:
Thanks to: 

Spleen — for amazing card and relic art. 

solderist.park — whose Cursed mod source code I used to get started (use Default Mod!) 

CaptainSnafu — for an excellent Chinese translation! 

Rucodeby — for the Russion translation!  

HarryWardp, Basilisk, Greuben, CannonballFun, and Toddells — for invaluable playtesting and feedback.
mods.description: A simple farmer with a head like a pinewood block.
